name: cypress-automation-framework
description: E2E Testing Framework with Cypress, Cucumber and Allure Reports

scripts.e2e: npm run cy:clean && cypress run --env allure=true
scripts.report:allure: allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && allure open allure-report
scripts.test:allure: npm run e2e && npm run report:allure
scripts.allure:history: if exist allure-report/history move allure-report/history allure-results/history
scripts.allure:clear: if exist allure-results rmdir /s /q allure-results && if exist allure-report rmdir /s /q allure-report
scripts.allure:test: npm run allure:clear && npm run e2e && npm run allure:history

author: Thiago Fraga
